SELECT 
  DATE(p.created_at) as fecha,
  COUNT(p.id) as total_pedidos,
  SUM(p.total) as ventas_totales,
  AVG(p.total) as promedio_por_pedido,
  COUNT(DISTINCT p.mesa_id) as mesas_utilizadas,
  COUNT(DISTINCT p.empleado_id) as empleados_activos,
  -- Propinas del d√≠a
  COALESCE(SUM(prop.monto), 0) as propinas_totales,
  -- Gastos del d√≠a
  COALESCE(SUM(g.monto), 0) as gastos_totales,
  -- √ìrdenes de compra del d√≠a
  COALESCE(SUM(oc.total), 0) as ordenes_compra_total,
  -- Balance neto
  (COALESCE(SUM(p.total), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(prop.monto), 0)) - 
  (COALESCE(SUM(g.monto), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(oc.total), 0)) as balance_neto
FROM pedidos p
LEFT JOIN propinas prop ON p.id = prop.pedido_id AND DATE(prop.fecha) = CURRENT_DATE
LEFT JOIN gastos_diarios g ON DATE(g.fecha) = CURRENT_DATE
LEFT JOIN ordenes_compra oc ON DATE(oc.fecha) = CURRENT_DATE
WHERE DATE(p.created_at) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY DATE(p.created_at);

SELECT 
  e.id,
  e.nombre,
  e.apellido,
  e.rol,
  COUNT(p.id) as pedidos_atendidos,
  SUM(p.total) as ventas_generadas,
  AVG(p.total) as promedio_por_pedido,
  MIN(p.created_at) as primer_pedido,
  MAX(p.created_at) as ultimo_pedido
FROM empleados e
LEFT JOIN pedidos p ON e.id = p.empleado_id 
  AND DATE(p.created_at) = CURRENT_DATE
WHERE e.activo = true
GROUP BY e.id, e.nombre, e.apellido, e.rol
ORDER BY ventas_generadas DESC;

SELECT 
  g.concepto,
  g.monto,
  g.categoria,
  e.nombre || ' ' || e.apellido as empleado_responsable,
  g.notas
FROM gastos_diarios g
LEFT JOIN empleados e ON g.empleado_id = e.id
WHERE DATE(g.fecha) = CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY g.monto DESC;

SELECT 
  oc.id,
  p.nombre as proveedor,
  oc.total,
  oc.estado,
  e.nombre || ' ' || e.apellido as empleado_solicitante,
  oc.notas
FROM ordenes_compra oc
LEFT JOIN proveedores p ON oc.proveedor_id = p.id
LEFT JOIN empleados e ON oc.empleado_id = e.id
WHERE DATE(oc.fecha) = CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY oc.total DESC;

SELECT
  metodo_pago,
  SUM(monto) as total_por_metodo,
  COUNT(id) as transacciones_por_metodo
FROM pagos
WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE AND estado = 'completado'
GROUP BY metodo_pago;
